meanings.definition: Extremely luxurious or elegant in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room was ultraposh with its soft velvet curtains and golden chandeliers.
meanings.sent2: She always wore ultraposh dresses to the fancy parties.
meanings.sent3: The ultraposh cat insisted on sleeping on a silk pillow.
meanings.sent4: The ultraposh mansion stood out like a sparkling diamond in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The ultraposh car gleamed under the bright sun, turning heads as it passed by.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is considered to be extremely fashionable or stylish.
meanings.sent1: Everyone admired her as the ultraposh of the school, always setting new trends.
meanings.sent2: The ultraposh of the party arrived in a stunning designer gown.
meanings.sent3: The ultraposh of the office had a collection of stylish pens on his desk.
meanings.sent4: She was the ultraposh of the dance floor, moving gracefully to the music.
meanings.sent5: The ultraposh of the town was known for hosting elegant soirées in her garden.
